hackathon-description-text: The Basics: BitwiseHacks is a unique opportunity for secondary school and university students to participate in a fast-paced hackathon environment, while competing against their peers for unique opportunities in Hong Kong's vibrant tech and startup space, as well as other prizes.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Senior Director of Asia Pacific for IoT / AT&T
Director of Global Network Engineering / AT&T

hackathon-eligibility:
* All team members must be currently enrolled students
* All work must be completed between the hours of February 20th 12:00 to February 21st at 12:00, 2016. Offenders will be disqualified.
* Teams must consist of no more than 5 persons
hackathon-rules:
* All contestants must present a valid school ID. Those without a valid school ID will be turned away at the door without refund- no exceptions.
* All work must be completed between the hours of February 20th 12:00 to February 21st at 12:00, 2016. Offenders will be disqualified.
* Teams must consist of no more than 5 persons. Offenders will be disqualified.
* 
 must be signed

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The top overall winner will receive 5000HKD sponsored by MiQ, one free month of hot desk space for each team member at the Paperclip HK coworking space(valued at 2000HK/month/team member for up to five team members), and one free TI-CC3200 Launchpad from AT&T (valued at 230HKD).
The best solution in its software merits will receive 2000HKD and one TI-CC3200 Launchpad from AT&T (valued at 230HKD).
The best solution in its hardware merits will receive 2000HKD and one TI-CC3200 Launchpad from AT&T (valued at 230HKD).
The judges' choice winner will receive a VEX Robotics IQ Super Kit, that is valued at 3048HKD retail

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1 Red Hill Rd, Tai Tam Tuk, Hong Kong

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is your app innovative in its solution, architecture, and implementation?
We're looking for beauty and elegance in presentation, with a smooth user experience.
How well did your demo function?
Your demo and presentation should show off powerful features relevant to your solution.

Your app should have potential as a profitable and marketable product in the marketplace. Seeing as this is not purely a coding competition, it is necessary to have this in mind while architecting your solution and the presentation.

hackathon-location-address: 1 Red Hill Rd, Tai Tam Tuk, Hong Kong
hackathon-description-header: BitwiseHacks is a unique opportunity for secondary school and university students to participate in a fast-paced hackathon
